title: NJ police under fire after cuffing black teen in mall fight as white teen watches - New York Post
content:
1. NJ police under fire after cuffing black teen in mall fight as white teen watches  New York Post
  2. Video showing police breaking up a fight between a Black teen and a White teen in a New Jersey mall prompts outrage  CNN
  3. Video of NJ officers breaking up teens' mall fight raises concerns about racial disparity  Yahoo News
  4. CAUGHT ON VIDEO: Video of police breaking up New Jersey mall fight sparks outrage, investigation  6abc Philadelphia
  5. Video of police breaking up NJ mall fight sparks outrage, investigation into treatment of Black teen  WLS-TV
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: A New Jersey police department is under fire after two officers handcuffed and pinned a black teen to the ground during a weekend mall fight while the white teen involved in the feud was left to siâ€¦
